name: Unique Enterprises
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “Unique Enterprises, Mumbai”, are considered as one of the acclaimed organizations engaged in the field of Manufacturing, Supplying Importing, Trading, Wholesaling and Exporting an excellent range of Energy Conservation and Solar Water Heating Products. Under the offered range, we provide Energy Conservation Products, Solar Products, Emergency Lights, Special Application Products, Wires and Solar Water Heating System.

Our Aim: Our Company’s aim is to provide best quality products to clients at competitive rates and within the scheduled time period. For this, highest priority is given to new product development comprising optimum quality.

Mission: The prime objective of our organization has been to attain full customer satisfaction not only till buying but also provide post sales support. We have always kept our promise to deliver best products with incorporation of latest trends.

Our Team: Our team appointed by us have been providing valuable and very genuine services for the perfect manufacturing process with our sincere goal to manufacture only the best. Owing to their hard work and endeavors, we have garnered satisfaction level of our clients in an efficient manner.

Our Infrastructure: backed by our well-organized infrastructure that sprawling across a large area, we have been able to meet the diversified needs of our clients by offering them an excellent range of Energy Conservation and Solar Water Heating Products in an effective manner.

Quality Assurance: From the very beginning, quality assurance has been priority of focus followed by which we have been established our organization as one of the leading one in the field. Also, we appoint experienced quality controllers who keep a strict vigil of the manufacturing process of these Energy Conservation and Solar Water Heating Products.

Client Satisfaction: We have been implementing all our business activities in strict compliance with higher satisfaction level of our clients. We offer our esteemed clients with qualitative range of Energy Conservation and Solar Water Heating Products, that is prepared with the use by optimum-grade material and other components.
